title: The 3 Worst Pieces of Advice You Can Get, with Andy Frisella - MFCEO309
itunes:title: The 3 Worst Pieces of Advice You Can Get, with Andy Frisella - MFCEO309
description: So many of you are good people who genuinely want to kill it in your business & life, but a ton of the advice you are getting on the internet...on Instagram & YouTube & on all the podcasts by the success gurus & "business coaches"...well, it's f*cking terrible & really counterproductive to your success. There are three pieces of advice in particular that are the worst. In this episode, I tell you what they are & actually provide the right advice, so you can make the impact & money you really want to make.
